pages.title: Ammo Cartridge
pages.text: Carry more rounds with the ammo cartridge! Use ($(k:use)) it to open a chest-like UI, on a turret it will attempt to fill that turret up, as long as it's the right kind of ammo.$(br2)$(italic)A cartridge can only hold one type of ammo! Once you put, for example, crossbow bolts in it, it'll not accept bullets anymore until it is empty.$()
*slaps cartridge* This boy can fit so many rounds in it
Note: If you have a cartridge in your inventory that isn't full, once you pick up ammo, the cartridge checks if it can accept the ammo and store it before it goes into your inventory.
